Chap. 7 - Four Letters to a Leading Missionary Worker in Africa

Letter A
     North Fitzroy, Victoria 
     July, 1892 

Dear Brother: 
     ...There are lessons for each child to learn in the line of firm trust, and implicit obedience. Jesus gave His life for us, that we should not perish, but believe in Him and have everlasting life. And shall we distrust God for one moment, when He has given us such evidence of His love? No, no; my soul cries out for the living water of life that I may refresh others....
